Text: EGM Structured Transaction OpportunitiesMike I just wanted to follow up with you after my meeting with Larry Lawyer Larry was positive about the product and business opportunity I developed for the broadband space However he also feels that the general business template I presented can be readily covered by his current team I am still open to meeting with other members of your team since some of your groups may like to have some people with structured finance and origination capabilities work a little more closely with them Ill follow your suggestion Thanks again for your time Mathis
